title: Tiresias Signfont in use... Anyone seen any?
content:
I know I’m like a one note tune on this subject, but I guess that just what I am at the moment.

Is anyone here aware of any place where Tiresias signfont is in use? On wayfinding signage in particular.

I have been told there is a small town some where in the UK, but the person who told me this doesn’t know the name of it.

Any help would be appreciated. Thank you.

 [‹ Designers! I need your help!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410040456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43872 "Go to previous forum topic") [Logotypes using Optima or Zapf Humanist ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080410040456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43881 "Go to next forum topic")
author: russellm
